Name: Broodje Daan
Review Text: Great and authentic broodje joint in Amsterdam West. Best combination of price and service I've found so far. The staff is hard working and kind. A laid back place for a quick bite. Nothing pretentious about it. Keep it up!!

Name: Broodje Daan
Review Text: Many sandwich options and the place has a good location. Recommended to try the local experience.

Heerlijke verzorgde broodjes en er wordt hard gewekt in de open keuken .
Alleen zelf koffie inschenken was even niet helemaal duidelijk ,maar ook de vers gezette koffie was prima . ‚Ä¶
